info.name: FXChrome - Return to classic blue
info.description: Change FXChrome colors to a nicer 'classic blue'.
info.additionalInfo:
Credits:
Based on "custom background color" stylish by htsbai, created in 2011.

The color provided in this stylish is the first "classic blue" (#4C91E5) that came with the early versions of Google Chrome.

It's more simplified so you only have to change titlebar and main-window background color if you want.
